attributes.action: let the general public decide on whether the payrise voted by MPs should be accepted or rejected?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think since the government has the power to decide on the annual pay rise given to public sector workers, they should be bound by the public on their own pay rises.  The salary of a MP is high enough and I feel that that most MPs have abused the right to decide there own pay rises for sometime.  I want the employers (the public) of the MPs to decide on their performance via the acceptance or rejection of the pay rise request.
